import ply
import ply.lex
import ply.yacc
from morphforge.core.mgrs.locmgr import LocMgr
from morphforge.traces.tags.tagselector import TagSelectorAll, TagSelectorAny
from morphforge.traces.tags.tagselector import TagSelectorAnd, TagSelectorNot, TagSelectorOr

reserved = {
    'AND': 'AND',
    'OR': 'OR',
    'NOT': 'NOT',
    'ANY': 'ANY',
    'ALL': 'ALL',
    }

tokens = [
    'LPARENS',
    'RPARENS',
    'LCURLYBRACKET',
    'RCURLYBRACKET',
    'COMMA',
    'TAG',
    'AND_SYM',
    'OR_SYM',
    'NOT_SYM',
    ] + list(reserved.keys())

t_AND_SYM = r'&&'
t_OR_SYM = r'\|\|'
t_NOT_SYM = r'!'
t_LPARENS = r"""\("""
t_RPARENS = r"""\)"""
t_LCURLYBRACKET = r"""{"""
t_RCURLYBRACKET = r"""}"""
t_COMMA = r""","""



[docs]def t_TAG(t):
    r'''[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_.:-]*'''

    t.type = reserved.get(t.value, 'TAG')
    return t


# Error handling rule



[docs]def t_error(t):
    print "Illegal character '%s'" % t.value[0]
    assert False



t_ignore = ' \t'

precedence = (
    ('left', 'OR', 'OR_SYM'),
    ('left', 'AND', 'AND_SYM'),
    ('right', 'NOT', 'NOT_SYM'),
)









[docs]def p_expression0(p):
    """ expr : tag_term_factor
             | tag_line_simple"""

    p[0] = p[1]


# One liners that don't have any keywords or {}()
# are considered 'ALL{contents}'



[docs]def p_simple0(p):
    """ tag_line_simple : TAG"""
    p[0] = TagSelectorAll(tags=[p[1]])




[docs]def p_simple1(p):
    """ tag_line_simple : tag_line_simple COMMA TAG"""
    p[0] = TagSelectorAll(tags=list(p[1].tags) + [p[3]])




[docs]def p_expression1(p):
    """ expr : LPARENS expr RPARENS """
    p[0] = p[2]




[docs]def p_expression_and(p):
    """ expr : expr AND expr
             | expr AND_SYM expr
    """
    p[0] = TagSelectorAnd(p[1], p[3])




[docs]def p_expression_or(p):
    """ expr : expr OR expr
             | expr OR_SYM expr
    """
    p[0] = TagSelectorOr(p[1], p[3])




[docs]def p_expression_not(p):
    """ expr : NOT expr
             | NOT_SYM expr
    """
    p[0] = TagSelectorNot(p[2])




[docs]def p_tag_term_factor(p):
    """tag_term_factor : tag_item_simple
                       | tag_group_factor_all
                       | tag_group_factor_any
                       """
    p[0] = p[1]




[docs]def p_tag_item_simple(p):
    """ tag_item_simple : TAG"""
    p[0] = TagSelectorAny(tags=[p[1]])




[docs]def p_tag_group_bracketed_all(p):
    """tag_group_factor_all : ALL tag_group_bracketed"""
    p[0] = TagSelectorAll(tags=p[2])




[docs]def p_tag_group_bracketed_any(p):
    """tag_group_factor_any : ANY tag_group_bracketed"""
    p[0] = TagSelectorAny(tags=p[2])




[docs]def p_tag_group_bracketed(p):
    """ tag_group_bracketed : LCURLYBRACKET tag_group RCURLYBRACKET """
    p[0] = p[2]




[docs]def p_tag_group0(p):
    """tag_group : empty"""
    p[0] = []




[docs]def p_tag_group1(p):
    """tag_group : TAG"""
    p[0] = [p[1]]




[docs]def p_tag_group2(p):
    """tag_group : tag_group COMMA TAG"""
    p[0] = p[1] + [p[3]]




[docs]def p_empty(_p):
    '''empty :'''
    pass




[docs]def p_error(p):
    print 'Syntax error in input!'
    print p
    assert False




[docs]class _ParseCache(object):

    lex = None
    yacc = None




[docs]def parse_tagselector_string(s):
    if not _ParseCache.lex:
        _ParseCache.lex = ply.lex.lex()
    if not _ParseCache.yacc:
        _ParseCache.yacc = ply.yacc.yacc(tabmodule='tagselectorparser_parsetab', outputdir=LocMgr.ensure_dir_exists('/tmp/parsetabs/'), debug=0, write_tables=1, optimize=1)
    return _ParseCache.yacc.parse(s, lexer=_ParseCache.lex.clone())
